actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries

official_title: To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to increase the ceiling on the Federal share of the costs of phase I of the Orange County, California, Regional Water Reclamation Project.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to increase the ceiling on the Federal share of the costs of phase 1 of the Orange County, California, Regional Water Reclamation Project.

titles.title: To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to increase the ceiling on the Federal share of the costs of phase I of the Orange County, California, Regional Water Reclamation Project.
